item.title: How to run SonarQube analysis locally with Docker
item.description: The quality of a project can be measured by having a look at how the code is written. SonarQube can help you by running static code analysis and letting you spot the pain points. Letâ€™s learn how to install and run it locally with Docker. Link to article: https://www.code4it.dev/blog/sonarqube-local-with-docker/
